org.codice.ddf.catalog.transformer.zip

Class JarSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task

          • org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.SignJar
            • org.codice.ddf.catalog.transformer.zip.JarSigner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class JarSigner
extends org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.SignJar
    This class extends Ant's SignJar class. SignJar executes the jarsigner binary that exists in JDK in code. https://ant.apache.org/manual/Tasks/signjar.html

    • Method Detail

      • signJar

        public void signJar(File jarToSign,
                    String alias,
                    String keypass,
                    String keystore,
                    String storepass)
        Signs the given jar with the given parameters. Gives up if any exception occurs during the execution.
        Parameters:
        jarToSign - - a reference to the zip / jar to sign
        alias - - the alias to sign the zip / jar under
        keypass - - the password for the private key
        keystore - - the path to the keystore
        storepass - - the password for the keystore
